```
>>> var a: Answer = Answer.YES
>>> val b = Answer.NO
>>> val dir = Direction.EAST

```

```
>>> a
YES
>>> a.name
YES
>>> b
NO
>>> dir
EAST

```

```
>>> a.ordinal
0
>>> b.ordinal
1
>>> dir.ordinal
2
>>> a < Answer.MAYBE
true
>>> dir < Direction.SOUTH
false

```

```
>>> Answer.valueOf("YES")
YES
>>> Direction.valueOf("WEST")
WEST
>>> Direction.valueOf("NOWHERE")
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: No enum constant Line2.Direction.NOWHERE

```

```
>>> for (e in Answer.values()) println(e)
YES
NO
MAYBE
```
